DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study investigate effectiveness Neprinol maintain healthy cardiovascular health overweight obese adult . Subjects take 3 capsule , 3 time per day period 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigating Effects Neprinol Study Product Vascular Function
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year age . Overweight subject ( BMI ≥ 27 < 30 ) Obese subject ( BMI > 30 ≤ 35 ) Subjects elevate cholesterol . Total cholesterol 240 mg/dL . Subjects elevate inflammation HSCRP ≥ 3 mg/L . Judged Investigator general good health basis medical history . Females child bear potential must agree use appropriate birth control method entire study period . Agree initiate new exercise diet program entire study period . Agree change current diet exercise program entire study period . Understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator . Subjects history congestive heart failure ( classification ) , unstable angina , acute coronary syndrome within past 30 day . Uncontrolled hypertension ( blood pressure ≥ 170/100 mm Hg ) Subjects history gastrointestinal disease surgery affect absorption Subjects peripheral arterial disease Daily use NSAIDs , however 81mg aspirin daily cardio protection allow Daily use antiinflammatory omega3fatty acid dietary supplement 2 week washout allow Use immunosuppressive drug last 12 month ( include steroid biologics ) Any significant GI condition would severely interfere evaluation study product include limited inflammatory bowel disease ( Ulcerative Colitis Chron 's ) , history frequent diarrhea , history surgery weight loss ( include gastric bypass lapband ) , history perforation stomach intestine , gastroparesis , clinically important lactose intolerance Subjects history use diabetic medication prior 4 week study start Subjects history use insulin prior 12 week study start . Any active infection , infection last month require antibiotic , antiviral medication , hospitalization History presence cancer prior two year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer . Subjects history seizure Recent history ( within 12 month ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Participation clinical study exposure nonregistered drug product within 30 day prior . Individual condition Investigator believe would interfere ability provide inform consent , comply study protocol , might confound interpretation study result put person undue risk . Including subject Bed wheelchairbound Untreated unstable Hypothyroidism Subjects active eat disorder include anorexia nervosa , bulimia , and/or obsessive compulsive eating disorder Pregnant , lactating , unwilling use adequate contraception duration study
